title: Add Wellness Membership Page
description:
Create a wellness membership landing page at /wellness featuring:
- Infrared Sauna section with benefits and best times to use
- NormaTec Compression section with benefits and best times to use  
- Pricing display: Wellness Membership $99/month (8 sessions), 10-session punch card $99
- Single CTA linking to Acuity: https://app.acuityscheduling.com/schedule/0cb40a58
- Explanatory text about contacting gym for plan options
- Navigation integration: Add "Wellness" to main nav

Content from screenshots:
INFRARED SAUNA: Detoxification, relaxation, skin health, pain relief, improved circulation, weight loss. Best times: post-workout (20-30 min), morning for energy, evening for sleep.
NORMATEC: Reduced muscle soreness, improved circulation, faster recovery, lymphatic drainage. Best times: post-workout (15-20 min immediately after), rest days, pre-event.

title: Create /wellness page with hero, Infrared Sauna section, NormaTec section, pricing, and CTA
Add Wellness to navigation (desktop nav items + mobile sheet)
